reviewTitle: Great Sound Quality at an Affordable Price
reviewDescription: I've been using the Speaker for five days now, and I'm genuinely impressed. The sound quality is excellent, especially considering the affordable price. The battery life is impressive, easily lasting through extended use without needing frequent recharges. Additionally, the speaker is lightweight and portable, making it easy to carry around. Overall, it's a fantastic value for the money. Highly recommended

I was hesitant to try the speaker at first but the moment I got it and tested, I felt a sigh of relief. It is very small in size but sturdy, sound wise its fantastic. Durable, sturdy and small. I thought the sound would break when volume is increased, however that didn't happen. I am way more happy that I bought this over all other speakers. Tested calls as well, which went good. I am not sure how speaker would work when kept in distance. As I tested it keeping it near to my mouth.
Appropriate music for this price.music is loud and clear.value for money .you can buy it....
Worth for money

reviewTitle: Very good product at that range
reviewDescription: The media could not be loaded.

I bought this in August 2023 nd reviewing in October 2024 after 1 years use. Sound quality:- good sound quality which is enough for a single room or hallBass :- bass is very good in this priceBattery :- battery will give you 25 to 30hrs backup at 70% volume and 10 to 15 hrs at 100% ..My battery draining issue started few days back but still it gives 15 hrs backup at 70% at full chargeMajor drawback I felt in this is it's charging time is higher. It takes upto 6 to 8 hrs to get full charged.Color :- in picture black not looks good but in reality black colour is more appealing than greySize :- size is very compatible and very handy , weight is little higher than the speakers in this range ,but weight also makes it durable.
Good for the price but the base could have been a bit better ..Although not disappointed as we get what we pay for ..
Product is as it is as shown in Amazon website. Portable and with loud sound.

I am writing this review after 1 month usage.Build Quality A1 hai. Battery badiya hai. Poora din chal jati hai non-stop 12-13 hrs. Quick pair bhi ho jati hai. Awaz bhi loud hai but call par awaz automatically kam ho jati hai. 1 week use Karne ke baad Aawaz kam ho gyi hai or ab lagatar decrease hi hoti ja rahi hai. Calls par mic bakvas hai. speaker Ekdum pass lakar baat karni padti hai vo bhi jor jor se bolna padta hai. Speaker se baat karna possible nahi hai. Baat karne ke liye speaker ko mobile ki Tarah hath me pakadkar kaan pe lagana padta hai or jor jor se bolne par Aawaz jati hai. Bluetooth Range is about 10 feet. Or jo blue light jalti hai bada pareshan karti hai phone se pair hone ke baad nahi jalni chahiye. Speaker on Karne par full volume par on hota hai jo bekar hai last used volume par set hona chahiye. Charging time is about 4-5 hours to full charge. Battery 100% se 40% tak dheere-dheere down hoti hai 40% par aate hi within 15-20 min 0% its some software glitch isko resolve karo. Developer needs these improvementsMic is most important at least 2 feet se baat honi chahiye jo ki isme nahi hoti.
I use this device at my house regularly and very impressed üíØüòÅ
Battery :- 4/5Sound quality :- 4.5/5Bass :- 3.5/5Overall performance according to money :- 4.5/5

Unbelievable battery life. Previously I was thinking the claimed 36 hours battery life is a hoax. I thought it will be OK if it lasts 20 hours. My goodness now I play it daily  with memory cardfor 2 hours in medium  and charge only once in 28 days ! Yeah it is True my amazon basic bt speaker play 56 hours with memory card. I do not play with Bluetooth switching on as I only play for meditation.I had never imagined there would be a bt speaker that would need charging only once in a month. I had bt speakers that needed charging almost daily.I suggest all that don't go by its size. It is amazing. If you need a bt speaker for non stop playing it will not fail you.
Long battery life, good sound
Great look nd colour works great

I purchased this Bluetooth speaker in October 2024, expecting reliable sound quality based on its features and reviews.The Issue:However, within just a few months, the speaker sound has broken. The audio now distorts, even at moderate volumes, and the overall performance has significantly declined. Given the price point, I expected the product to last much longer without any degradation in sound quality.This issue arose without any apparent physical damage or misuse, raising questions about the product's durability.
